surface.title: Surface
surface.description: One level of parking on the ground.

street_side.title: Street-Side
street_side.description: Parking directly adjacent to the street (but not on it).

lane.title: Roadside Lane
lane.description: Parking on the street (which could be easily converted to a travel lane).

multi-storey.title: Multilevel
multi-storey.description: Two or more levels of parking decks in a building structure.

rooftop.title: Rooftop
rooftop.description: One level of a parking deck on top of a building.

carports.title: Carports
carports.description: Structure used to offer limited protection to vehicles, typically without walls.

garage_boxes.title: Garage Boxes
garage_boxes.description: Private garage with multiple individual boxes for one car each.

layby.title: Turnout / Lay-By
layby.description: Parking at a rest area, alongside a road.
